title: rito can i plizz get 6 rp to assassin master yi skin plizz
body:
http://imgur.com/QT3sSTf
 i hope i can get 6 RP TY
hope for riot to be kind

replies.body:
Hey Falgren94,

Just shoot your request over [@RiotSupport](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) on Twitter and they'll let you know if they can grant the RP (they'll only do this once). You can also submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

-DTN

Yep!  Right on the money!

There might be something we can do, but you'll have to contact us on those channels!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wyVGHwjk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T22:49:05.497+0000)
>
> Yep!  Right on the money!
> 
> There might be something we can do, but you'll have to contact us on those channels!

Love how u guys post on useless crap like this but anything of any volume u ignore...

If you go to the **Help & Support** board and look through what he's been responding to, he has answered a variety of topics, including important ones such as patch update failures and ping issues.

https://i.gyazo.com/4a5ab71cf24f5236b3391f8701677e82.gif
What kind of request type should I make the request ticket If I simply need 1 RP?
Requests that don't seem to have a specific category I put under **General Questions**.
Thank you! I highly appreciate it.
